scripts.js:app: rollup static/javascript/app.js --file static/app/js/app.js --format umd --plugin node-resolve --plugin commonjs --plugin terser
scripts.js:charts: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' rollup static/javascript/charts.js --file static/app/js/charts.js --format umd --inlineDynamicImports --plugin node-resolve --plugin commonjs --plugin terser
scripts.build: npm run css && npm run js:app && npm run js:charts && tmp/venv/bin/python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
